data.name: AzureVMNotFound
data.value:
The specified Azure Virtual Machine Not Found. Possible causes are 1. VM does not exist 2. The VM name or the Service name needs to be case sensitive 3. VM is already Protected with same or other Vault. Please Unprotect VM first and then try to protect it again.
Please contact Microsoft for further assistance.

data.name: AzureFileShareNotFound
data.value: Looks like File Shares similar to specified Azure File Share are not found. Possible causes are 1. The Azure File Share does not exist 2. The Azure File Share is already protected with same Vault. Please unprotect the Azure File Shares first and then try to protect it again. 3. The Azure File Share is already protected with another Vault. Please unprotect the Azure File Share first, unregister the Storage Account from that Vault and protect it again. Please contact Microsoft for further assistance.

data.value: For Azure File share, Storage account name can not be empty

data.name: RetentionDurationCountInDaysInvalidException
data.value: RetentionDuration in Days should be from 7 - 9999

data.name: ProtectedItemsCountExceededException

data.name: AFSDiscoveryFailure

data.name: FriendlyNamePassedWarning
data.value: A friendly name might return multiple items since it is not unique. To get a unique item, please use the -name parameter. Pass the value displayed under the name column when displayed as a table or use the name field in the PS object

data.name: TargetContainerRequiredException
data.value: Target Container parameter is required for this operation.

data.name: AFSWeeklyScheduleNotAllowed
data.value: Weekly Backup Schedule for Azure File Share policy is not allowed. Please give Daily Schedule input instead.

data.name: DiskExclusionParametersRedundant
data.value: Multiple Parameters Provided. Please specify only one of the parameters from InclusionDisksList, ExclusionDisksList, ResetExclusionSetting and ExcludeAllDataDisks.

data.name: InclusionListRedundantError
data.value: Both Inclusion and Exclusion lists provided. Please provide only one of them.

data.name: TargetRGUnmanagedRestoreDuplicateParamsException
data.value: Both RestoreAsUnmanagedDisks and TargetResourceGroupName can't be spceified. Please give Only one parameter and retry.

data.name: UnmanagedVMRestoreWarning
data.value: This is a managed disk recovery point and hence please provide a target resource group for the managed disks to be restored into with the TargetResourceGroupName parameter. Otherwise, please explicitly state that the managed disks should be restored into the staging storage account as unmanaged disks with restoreAsUnmanagedDisks parameter

data.name: AzureFileSourceFilePathRedundantException
data.value: Both source file path and multiple source file paths provided. Please give only one option

data.name: TargetVaultNotEmptyException
data.value: Please provide an empty target vault. The target vault should not have any backup items or backup containers

data.name: TargetVaultStorageRedundancy
data.value: Are you sure you want to copy items to the {0} whose storage redundancy is {1}

data.name: TargetResourcegroupNotSupported
data.value: Target ResourceGroup is not applicable and restore will proceed as unmanaged disk restore since this is unmanaged VM

data.name: InvalidTargetStorageAccount
data.value: Please provide a vaild target storage account

data.name: RecoveryPointVaultRecoveryTypeException
data.value: Please ensure that the given RP recovery type is 'VaultStandard' or remove TargetZone

data.name: RecoveryPointZonePinnedException
data.value: Please ensure that the Recovery point is Zone pinned or remove TargetZone

data.name: ZonalRestoreVaultStorageRedundancyException
data.value: Please check whether the vault storageRedundancy is ZRS or RA-GRS or remove TargetZone

data.name: TargetVirtualMachineIdRequiredException
data.value: WorkloadRecoveryConfig TargetVirtualMachineId cannot be null for Alternate location restore

data.name: ArchiveNotSupported

data.name: ArchiveRecommendationNotSupported
data.value: Recommendation for Archival RP groups is not applicable for the workload type of the backup item passed in the cmdlet.

data.name: DeleteArchiveRecoveryPoints
data.value: You will incur early deletion fees for this operation as there are archived recovery points for the backup item you are trying to unprotect. Do you want to continue?

data.name: InvalidRehydrateDuration
data.value: Rehydrate duration should be between 10 and 30

data.name: InvalidRehydration
data.value: Please provide RehydrationPriority and RehydrationDuration for the Archived Recovery Point. Default RehydrationDuration is 15 Days

data.name: DeleteRecoveryPoints
data.value: Disable protection with delete recovery points

data.name: MoveRPOperation
data.value: Move Azure Backup Recovery Point Operation

data.name: MoveReadinessInfoUndefined
data.value: Move Readiness cannot be checked for given recovery points

data.name: MSIRestoreNotSupportedForUnmanagedVM
data.value: MSI based Restore is only applicable to Managed VM Recovery Points

data.name: MultipleMSIProvidedForRestore
data.value: MSI based Restore can't use both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned identities

data.name: IdentityIdRequired
data.value: IdentityId can't be empty for UserAssigned Identities

data.name: IdentityIdRequiredForCMK
data.value: Please input a valid UserAssignedIdentity

data.name: InvalidIdentityId
data.value: IdentityId '{0}' is invalid

data.name: InvalidIdentityRemove
data.value: UserAssigned and SystemAssigned identities can't be removed together

data.name: InvalidParameterIdentityId
data.value: Invalid parameter IdentityId. IdentityId can't be set for SystemAssigned Identities

data.name: DeleteContainerRegistration
data.value: Deleting server's registration is a destructive operation and cannot be undone. All backup data (recovery points required to restore the data) and Backup items associated with protected server will be permanently deleted. Learn more about deleting your protected servers at https://aka.ms/deletebkp. Do you want to continue?

data.name: UnregisterContainer
data.value: Unregister container

data.name: DailyRetentionPointsLimitExceeded
data.value: Number of restore points are more than {0}, please reduce the retention duration count for Daily Schedule or reduce number of backups per day

data.name: HourlyScheduleNullValueException
data.value: ScheduleInterval, ScheduleWindowStartTime, ScheduleWindowDuration, ScheduleRunTimeZone can't be null for Hourly policy

data.name: InvalidLastBackupTime
data.value: ScheduleWindowDuration should be less than or equal to (23:30 - ScheduleWindowStartTime)

data.name: InvalidScheduleInterval
data.value: Incorrect value for ScheduleInterval, allowed values are {0}

data.name: InvalidScheduleWindowDuration
data.value: ScheduleWindowDuration can't be lesser than ScheduleInterval and should exist in range from {0} to {1}

data.name: ScheduleWindowStartTimeOutOfRange
data.value: ScheduleWindowStartTime is out of range, valid range is from 00:00 to 19:30

data.name: TargetParamsMissingException
data.value: TargetVMName, TargetVNetName, TargetVNetResourceGroup, TargetSubnetName can't be empty for restoring to AlternateLocation with create new VM option

data.name: TargetRGNotRequiredException
data.value: TargetResourceGroupName parameter should be empty for OriginalLocation in-place restore

data.name: EnhancedHourlyPolicyNotSupported
data.value: Enhanced Hourly policy is currently not supported for WorkloadType AzureIaasVM. This will be supported soon

data.name: EnhancedPolicyNotSupported
data.value: Enhanced policy is only supported for workloadType AzureVM. Please provide correct PolicySubType and WorkloadType

data.name: HourlyScheduleNotNull
data.value: ScheduleInterval, ScheduleWindowStartTime, ScheduleWindowDuration must be empty for non-Hourly policy

data.name: NonHourlyAttributesNotNull
data.value: ScheduleRunTimes and ScheduleRunDays must be empty for Hourly policy

data.name: SnapshotRetentionOutOfRange
data.value: For Enhanced policy SnapshotRetentionRangeInDays, the minimum value is 1 and maximum is 30. For weekly backup policies, the minimum allowed value is 5. Please set the value accordingly

data.name: StandardHourlyPolicyNotSupported
data.value: Standard Hourly policy is not supported for WorkloadType AzureIaasVM, please try with Enhanced policy or different schedule frequency: Daily, Weekly

data.name: StandardHourlyScheduleNotSupported
data.value: Standard Hourly schedule is not supported for WorkloadType AzureVM

data.name: UnexpectedParamScheduleRunFrequency
data.value: ScheduleRunFrequency parameter is only expected for WorkloadTypes: AzureVM, AzureFiles

data.name: WeeklyScheduleNotSupported
data.value: Weekly ScheduleRunFrequency isn't supported for WorkloadType: AzureFiles

data.name: WindowDurationLessThanInterval
data.value: ScheduleWindowDuration can't be less than ScheduleInterval for Hourly policy

data.name: WindowStartTimeNotInUTC
data.value: ScheduleWindowStartTime in Hourly schedule policy should be in UTC time, however policy can be created in a different time zone by providing the timezone in ScheduleRunTimeZone attribute

data.name: InvalidPolicyForTrustedVMProtection
data.value: Trusted VM can only be protected using Enhanced policy. Please provide a valid AzureVM Enhanced policy

data.name: ProtectedItemURICantBeNull
data.value: ProtectedItemURI can't be null as the operation is protected with ResourceGuard

data.name: PolicyUpdateNotCritical
data.value: Operation not critical, please try without the Token parameter. MUA currently only protects reducing or disabling retention times

data.name: UnexpectedParameterToken
data.value: {0} is not protected via MUA, either protect or try without the Token parameter

data.name: BackupConfigUpdateNotCritical
data.value: Operation not critical, please try without the Token parameter. MUA currently protects disabling SoftDelete or SecurityFeatures only when it was previously enabled

data.name: ResourceGuardMappingNotFound
data.value: ResourceGuardMapping not found

data.name: DisableWithRetainBackupNotCrititcal
data.value: Invalid parameter Token. Stop protection with retain backup data as per policy is not MUA protected

data.name: CRRNotSupportedWIthCSR
data.value: Cross region restore is not supported along with cross subscription restore, please try passing either RestoreToSecondaryRegion or TargetSubscriptionId parameter but not both

data.name: InvalidScheduleWindow
data.value: Hourly policy ScheduleWindowDuration should be multiple of ScheduleInterval and less than or equal to 24 Hrs. for WorkloadType AzureVM

data.name: SmartTieringNotSupported
data.value: Smart tiering is only supported for BackupManagementType AzureVM, AzureWorkload. Please try again after removing MoveToArchiveTier parameter.

data.name: InvalidParametersForTiering
data.value: Please remove TieringMode, TierAfterDuration, TierAfterDurationType parameters to disable smart tiering

data.name: TierRecommendedNotSupportedForAzureWorkload
data.value: Tiering mode TierRecommended is not supported for BackupManagementType AzureWorkload

data.name: InvalidParameterTierAfterDuration
data.value: TierAfterDuration, TierAfterDurationType is only acceptable for TieringMode: TierAllEligible

data.name: MissingParameterTierAfterDuration
data.value: TierAfterDuration, TierAfterDurationType is required for tiering mode TierAllEligible and the values should either be in Months or Days

data.name: SmartTieringNotSupportedForSubscription
data.value: Smart tiering is not supported for this subscription, please remove MoveToArchiveTier parameter and try again.

data.name: MissingMonthlyOrYearlyRetention
data.value: Monthly or Yearly retention needs to be set to enable Archive smart tiering

data.name: IncompatibleRetentionAndTieringPolicy
data.value: Monthly or Yearly retention needs to be set as smart tiering is enabled for this policy. Please modify retention or disable smart tiering. Please note that disabling smart tiering may involve additional costs.

data.name: IncompatibleRetentionPolicyForTierRecommended
data.value: At least one of monthly or yearly retention should be >= 9 months for enabling TierRecommended mode for smart tiering

data.name: RetentionShouldBeGreaterThan9MonthsOrDisableSmartTiering
data.value: At least one of monthly or yearly retention should be >= 9 months as smart tiering is enabled for this policy. Please modify retention or disable smart tiering. Please note that disabling smart tiering may involve additional costs.

data.name: InvalidDurationTypeForAzureVM
data.value: TierAfterDurationType should be in Months for workload type AzureVM

data.name: InvalidDurationForTierAllEligiblePolicy
data.value: TierAfterDuration needs to be >= 3 months, at least one of monthly or yearly retention should be >= (TierAfterDuration + 6) months

data.name: IncompatibleRetentionDurationWithTierAfterDuration
data.value: TierAfterDuration needs to be >= 3 months, at least one of monthly or yearly retention should be >= (TierAfterDuration + 6) months as smart tiering is enabled for this policy. Please modify retention or disable smart tiering. Please note that disabling smart tiering may involve additional costs.

data.name: FullBackupRetentionPolicyCantBeNull
data.value: FullBackupRetentionPolicy can't be null while enabling Archive smart tiering for BackupManagementType AzureWorkload

data.name: InvalidDurationTypeForAzureWorkload
data.value: TierAfterDurationType should be in Days for workload type AzureWorkload

data.name: IncompatibleRetentionPolicyWithTierAfterDuration
data.value: TierAfterDuration needs to be >= 45 Days, at least one retention policy for full backup (daily / weekly / monthly / yearly) should be >= (TierAfter + 180) days

data.name: TierAfterDurationCheckFailedWithRetentionDuration
data.value: TierAfterDuration needs to be >= 45 Days, at least one retention policy for full backup (daily / weekly / monthly / yearly) should be >= (TierAfter + 180) days as smart tiering is enabled for this policy. Please modify retention or disable smart tiering. Please note that disabling smart tiering may involve additional costs.

data.name: UnsupportedCZRWithNonZonePinnedVMForCRRVault
data.value: For triggering cross zonal restore for CRR enabled (RA-GRS) vaults, please ensure that the recovery point is zone pinned. Please remove TargetZone parameter or try a valid scenario.

data.name: UnsupportedCZRForCRRVaultToPrimaryRegion
data.value: For triggering cross zonal restore for CRR enabled (RA-GRS) vaults, please ensure that the restore is triggered for secondary region. Please remove TargetZone parameter or try a valid scenario.

data.name: CantRemoveAndRetainRPsSimultaneously
data.value: RemoveRecoveryPoints and RetainRecoveryPointsAsPerPolicy parameters can't be used simultaneously.

data.name: VaultLocationRequired
data.value: VaultLocation can't be empty for fetching jobs from secondary region.

data.name: VaultLocationRequiredForCRR
data.value: VaultLocation can't be empty for cross region restore.

data.name: CSRAndCRRNotSupportedWithEdgeZoneRestore
data.value: RestoreToEdgeZone parameter can't be used for cross region or cross subscription restore

data.name: InvalidEdgeZoneVM
data.value: Please make sure that the recovery point belongs to an edge zone VM and contains extended location

data.name: RequiredBackupSnapshotResourceGroup
data.value: The parameter BackupSnapshotResourceGroupSuffix cannot be used without the BackupSnapshotResourceGroup parameter. Please provide the BackupSnapshotResourceGroup parameter or remove the BackupSnapshotResourceGroupSuffix parameter.

data.name: TrustedLaunchDefaultWarning
data.value: Ignite (November) 2023 onwards Virtual Machine deployments using PS and CLI will default to Trusted Launch configuration. You need to ensure Policy Name used with this command is of type Enhanced Policy for Trusted Launch VMs. Non-Trusted Launch Virtual Machines will not be impacted by this change. To know more about default change and Trusted Launch, please visit https://aka.ms/TLaD.

data.name: UnbakedSnapshotRecoveryPoint
data.value: Snapshot recovery point time is less than 4 Hrs ago, please try later or with another recovery point

data.name: StdToEnhPolicyMigrationWarning
data.value: Upgrading to enhanced policy can incur additional charges. Once upgraded to the enhanced policy, it is not possible to revert back to the standard policy

data.name: SnapshotConsistencyTypeCantBeSetForStandardPolicy
data.value: SnapshotConsistencyType parameter can only be used for enhanced AzureVM policy

data.name: InvalidParameterSnapshotConsistencyType
data.value: SnapshotConsistencyType parameter can only be used for WorkloadType AzureVM

data.name: AADPropertiesCouldNotBeFetchedException
data.value: An error occured while fetching AAD properties, this property is needed to get CRR access token

data.name: CRRAccessTokenCouldNotBeFetchedException
data.value: Unable to fetch CRR access token. Please retry the operation or contact Microsoft support if issue persists

data.name: AFSPolicyUpdateNotAllowed
data.value: Switching the backup tier from vaulted backup to snapshot is not possible. Please create a new policy for snapshot-only backups.

data.name: AFSPolicyUpdateWarning
data.value: Changing the backup tier keeps current snapshots as-is under the existing policy. Future backups will be stored in the vault with new retention settings. This action is irreversible and incurs additional costs. Switching from vault to snapshot requires reconfiguration. Learn more at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/backup/azure-file-share-backup-overview?tabs=snapshot.

data.name: AFSPolicyUpdate
data.value: Changing Policy to VaultStandard tier.

data.name: AFSPolicyUpdateCanceled
data.value: Canceled Operation.

data.name: SnapshotRetentionInDaysInvalidException
data.value: SnapshotRetentionInDays should be from 1 - 30
